::FZ/DevilDuer::

FZ looks at the scanners for a second more to make sure that the 
Infecticon ship wasn't heading toward the Iron Fist, then turns back 
to Vamprah.

"There's a machine in one of the labs. Here, I'll take you to it."

He walks out of the room, gesturing for Vamprah to follow. His wrist 
comp beeps again, announcing two bots landing in the middle of Spain. 
He taps his comm. "DevilDuer, can you go check out the new ship that 
just landed? There are two bots. Try to recruit them."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer nods, for once thankful of something to do. "Sure thing," 
he replies to FZ, turning to Swyft.

"Stay right here. I'll be back."

Running out of the Iron Fist, DevilDuer dives into the water and 
swims toward the shore.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Vamprah::
> 
> "How can I take that mode?" asked Vamprah
